name: Diamond Push-Ups
how_to_perform:
1. Start in the standard push-up position, with your body in a straight line from head to heels and your feet together.

2. Bring your hands together directly beneath your chest, forming a diamond shape by touching your thumbs and index fingers together.

3. Keep your elbows close to your sides and engage your core muscles to stabilize your body.

4. Lower your chest towards your hands while keeping your back flat and maintaining the diamond shape with your hands.

5. Descend until your chest nearly touches your hands, then pause briefly.

6. Push through your hands to extend your elbows and return to the starting position.

7. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, keeping the motion controlled throughout.
short_summary: Diamond push-ups are a variation of the classic push-up, targeting the triceps more intensely by placing the hands close together beneath the chest.
